title: Sample AI Voice Pack
description: 390 voice samples for AI / NPC, including quest, combat or science.
longDescription:
FeaturesÂ 

  • 390 voice samples
  • 4 female voices
  • 12 male voices
  • Example usage video
  • Should be compatible with all Engine versions
  • 110 cue files
  • 1 attenuation file
  • Setup for quick and easy usage

This pack will likely be extended with similar voice samples.






Update 1.2

Added 178 voices (only included with UE5+ versions)

  • 11 x Female Emotions
  • 15 x Female Growls
  • 2 x Female Grunts
  • 12 x Female Combat Kung-Fu


  • 15 x Male Voice
  • 18 x Male Hero Voice


  • 5 x Male Breathing
  • 4 x Male Coughing
  • 6 x Male Growls
  • 65 x Male Grunts
  • 20 x Male Grunt Punch Slap
  • 5 x Male Screams


References https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CwHvKo5uErjHM4LnC_15jh3GxmBd44Gjy795eRsKpl0/






Update 1.1

Added 7 different voices (only included with UE5+ versions)

  • 3 x Criminal
  • 6 x Police Officer
  • 7 x General
  • 9 x Vendor
  • 19 x Science ( 16 long wav about sea level rise)

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 390

Number of Audio Cues: 110

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 22,050 and 44,100 kHz, 24 bit Stereo WAV

Do Sound FX Loop: No

Minutes of Audio Provided: ~15 Min

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: Install asset pack

Additional Notes: If you encounter problems when migrating to older versions, delete the attenuation file. Cue files are setup to play modulated, random samples. The purpose of this pack is to provide easy access to voices for shooter games. The two combat Cues include gender specific parameters, you can read on how to trigger those: https://answers.unrealengine.com/questions/35936/how-to-set-up-an-integer-for-an-audio-cue-switch.html

You can tweak voice volumes and pitches inside each Cue file of the "Modulator node".
